text: That's strictly a Magento method. You may want to look at this article for HubSpot options. <https://blog.HubSpot.com/customers/create-multilingual-content-HubSpot>
Yea, I was hoping for an equivalent in HubSpot. Too bad they dont have one :\

I think they lean more into not automatically translating things and letting you create translations and serve them differently. You may want to check this community thread for some automatic options if that's what you're aiming for. <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Marketing-Integrations/What-is-the-best-translation-service-to-use-with-the-HubSpot-COS/td-p/10963>
